snippet: Chef Jasper White spotted a rare dappled yellow lobster, about a one-in-30-million find, while cleaning the lobster tank at a restaurant in Cambridge, Mass.
abstract: Jasper White, owner of New England’s Summer Shack restaurants, saves a rare calico lobster from being cooked in one of his kitchens; White donates the lobster, now named Calvin, to the New England Aquarium.
lead_paragraph: Chef Jasper White spotted a rare dappled yellow lobster, about a one-in-30-million find, while cleaning the lobster tank at a restaurant in Cambridge, Mass.

headline.seo: Rare Calico Lobster Saved by Chef Jasper White
headline.main: Rare Calico Lobster Is Spared From the Menu
headline.print_headline: Chef Spots Rare Calico Lobster and Saves Him From Menu
